ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Geometries to plot network objects with 'ggplot2'.
Geometries to plot network objects with 'ggplot2'.

name: r-ggnetwork
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.14" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggnetwork
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggnetwork_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggnetwork/ggnetwork_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: caab79d85a817608e9a9d827783f157393fc3f2b9de8c20669699175a19f3ff0

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.0.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.5
    - r-igraph
    - r-network
    - r-sna
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.0.0
    - r-ggrepel >=0.5
    - r-igraph
    - r-network
    - r-sna

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggnetwork')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggnetwork')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/briatte/ggnetwork
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Geometries to plot network objects with 'ggplot2'.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ggnetwork
# Type: Package
# Title: Geometries to Plot Networks with 'ggplot2'
# Description: Geometries to plot network objects with 'ggplot2'.
# Version: 0.5.8
# Date: 2020-02-06
# Maintainer: Francois Briatte <f.briatte@gmail.com>
